body:
Hi Saurabh,

Chris has implemented lighting schedules for OpenStudio. [I opened an issue](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/455) so he can take a look at this and another similar issue. If he couldn't take a look soon I will give it a try.

I assume you're using OpenStudio HVAC systems and that's why you're not using EnergyPlus component. Is that right?

Mostapha
